Privacy Policy for Web TOC Assistant
Last Updated: January 15, 2026

1. Data Collection and Usage
Web TOC Assistant ("the Extension") is designed with privacy as a priority. We do not collect, store, transmit, or sell any user data to external servers. All data processing occurs locally on your device.

2. Permissions
The Extension requires specific permissions to function:

Read and change all your data on the websites you visit (Host Permissions): This is used solely to scan the webpage for heading elements (h1-h6) to generate the table of contents. The content of the pages is never sent to any server.

Storage: This is used to save your user preferences (e.g., the position of the floating button or per-site settings) locally in your browser.

Tabs: This is used to detect the current website's URL to determine if the Extension should be enabled or disabled based on your settings.

3. Third-Party Services
The Extension does not use any third-party analytics or tracking services.

4. Contact
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: bingqiangzhou7@gmail.com
